title: Texas Judge Strikes Down Biden’s Student Debt Cancellation
description: The ruling adds to the legal obstacles the president faces in his plan to cancel up to $20,000 per borrower in federal student loan debt.
dc:creator: Stacy Cowley
media:credit: Pete Marovich for The New York Times
media:description: President Biden’s student debt cancellation plan has faced several legal challenges, though courts have generally rejected them.
